SimpleES A collection of "simple" Event Sourcing libraries for PHP

Event Sourcing

  • Home
  • Events
  • Aggregates
  • Aggregate Manager
  • Event Store

Bridges

  • JMS Serializer
  • Ramsey UUID
  • SimpleBus

v2.55.0 (2015/04/05)

  • #1460 localAddress or proxy config is lost when redirecting (@simov, @0x4139)
